name: Baby Drill
description:
Turn on your toy-drill with the key 🔑 and go on! 

You have **4 buttons** to control it:

🟠 Orange : Shoot your Laser against enemies 👾 

🔴 Red : Cold your toy-drill to avoid Overheat 🔥 

🟡 Yellow : Recharge your Energy ⚡ 

🟢 Green : Turbo mode to go faster 

⏩ Pay attention to de alerts 🟦⚠️🛑 and good luck! 

(You can quit the game with Esc)
